comment.author: 52682399@N07
comment._content:
This photo is from a Tadd Dameron recording session for Blue Note at WOR Studios, New York, on September 26, 1947.
(L. B. Petersen and T. Rehak, The Music and Life of Theodore "Fats" Navarro (2009), 133–34, 151).
Same occasion as LC-GLB23- 654 and LC-GLB23- 655.
